CABARET NIGHT is this upcoming Saturday. Show starts at 7. See a slew of extremely talented people dancin', singin', and actin' the night away!

THE SKIN OF OUR TEETH is November 3-6 in the G-building, with the show at 7. $6 with ASB card, $8 without. It's going to be an awesome show, so come and bring your friends so you won't be lonely at intermission.
